com.px100systems.data.core

Class RuntimeStorage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.px100systems.data.core.RuntimeStorage

  • public class RuntimeStorage
extends java.lang.Object
    Non-persistent in-memory storage aka "data grid". Used internally by the system and also can be used directly to manage transient objects.
    See setters for configuration.
    Author:
    Alex Rogachevsky

        public java.lang.Long getLong(java.lang.String name,

        tenantId - tenant ID

      • getAllTransient

        public <T> java.util.List<T> getAllTransient(java.lang.Class<T> cls,
                                             int tenantId,
                                             Criteria criteria)
        Get unordered transient beans. use with caution, as there is no limit
        Type Parameters:
        T - bean class
        Parameters:
        cls - bean class
        tenantId - tenant ID
        criteria - - filter criteria or null to get everything. Criteria works for normal Entity subclasses and arbitrary beans.
        Returns:
        a list of beans.

      • findTransient

        public <T> java.util.List<T> findTransient(java.lang.Class<T> cls,
                                           int tenantId,
                                           Criteria criteria,
                                           java.util.List<java.lang.String> orderBy,
                                           int limit)
        Get ordered transient beans. use with caution, as there is no limit
        Type Parameters:
        T - bean class
        Parameters:
        cls - bean class
        tenantId - tenant ID
        criteria - - filter criteria or null to get everything. Criteria works for normal Entity subclasses and arbitrary beans.
        orderBy - - an optional list of SQL-like ORDER BY strings e.g. {"field1 ASC", "field2 DESC", "field3"}
        limit - mandatory list limit
        Returns:
        a list of beans.

        Type Parameters:

        Parameters:

        tenantId - tenant ID

        the count
